author: eps1lon
message: Fail task if one of the parallel ones fails (#81464)

files.patch:
@@ -32,6 +32,9 @@ patchedDependencies:

     path: patches/webpack-sources@3.2.3.patch

         specifier: 1.1.0

       tree-kill:

         version: 1.2.2

       terser:
